snippet: Chen Guangbiao, who is known for public stunts, said he was leading a group of investors seeking to acquire a large or controlling stake in The New York Times Company.
abstract: Wealthy Chinese businessman and philanthropist Chen Guangbiao, who is known for public stunts, says he is leading a group of investors seeking to acquire a large or controlling stake in The New York Times Company.

byline.contributor: Ravi Somaiya contributed reporting from New York and Stephanie Yifan Yang contributed research from China.

lead_paragraph: Chen Guangbiao, who is known for public stunts, said he was leading a group of investors seeking to acquire a large or controlling stake in The New York Times Company.

headline.main: Chinese Businessman Seeking Stake in Times Co.
headline.print_headline: Chinese Businessman Seeking Stake in Times Co.
